td6.data

Class GhostImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • td6.data.EntityAbstract
      • td6.data.GhostImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Entity, Ghost

    public class GhostImpl
extends EntityAbstract
implements Ghost
    Implementation of ghost which allows to have and modify data about a ghost
    Invariants :
    corridor.x == x and corridor.y == y

        Constructor of new ghost
        Parameters:
        x - the x coordinate of the ghost
        y - the y coordinate of the ghost
        points - the value in points of the ghost if he is eaten
        timeToSpawn - the time wich the ghost has to wait before spawn
